com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice.transport
Class Boundary

java.lang.Object
  com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice.transport.Boundary
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbsoluteBoundary, TimestampBoundary, VersionBoundary
public abstract class Boundary
extends Object

A specifier for one end of a range of Item versions, for use when requesting an ItemHistory.

The Boundary class itself is abstract, but its subclasses enable the ends of the version range to be specified in different ways.

Since:
2.0
